column1: Smoque BBQ////I'll keep this short and sweet....Best barbecue I've ever had! Hands down! I've ordered everything at Smoque and it's all delicious. My absolute favorites being the brisket sand the baby back ribs. The sides are all amazing as well from the baked mac and cheese to the corn bread. You really can't go wrong and I would advise trying something different every time you go. Absolutely the best bbq and prices are reasonable as well. Need I say more?
